Articles.Content:
Hey guys,

I\'m hosting a little gathering for space aficionados and general alcoholics to celebrate the (hopefully successful) landing of the curiosity rover landing next Monday morning. I\'m in the Netherlands in the city of Assen, whoever is in the area and feels like having some morning beers and/ or checking out the landing is welcome to come join us. Let me know if you\'re interested.

Cheers

I will be there in spirit!

I\'m getting rather excited as the day approaches!
me and a group of friends are heading down to the Johnson Space Center here in Houston. it\'s going to be a historically awesome event!
It will be tomorrow! I hope curiosity kill our curiosity about mars

I\'ll be there in spirit, with a lack of spirits in my hand. ;P

Unfortunately, I don\'t know that many spacefarers except for the ones here and on Skype, so blarg. I\'m still very excited though.
